completeListOfAbilities.name: Aura Cannon
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
4-hit 聖 magic BRV attack + HP attack
Deals extra BRV damage to ghost types
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
All targets: 4 turns 風聖 Resist Down
Self: 8 turns 1 level of Battle Spirit Unleashed (limit 4)
Becomes Aura Cannon+ with at least 3 levels of Battle Spirit Unleashed
BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ while Battle Spirit Unleashed active

ailments.name: Battle Spirit Unleashed
ailments.desc: Battle Spirit Unleashed: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK (does not increase based on level)

ailments.name: PNPO Resist Down
ailments.desc: 風聖 Resist Down: Lowers 風聖 resist (lowered resist does not stack)

completeListOfAbilities.name: Aura Cannon+
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
4-hit 聖 magic BRV attack + HP attack that ignores DEF
Deals extra BRV damage to ghost types
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%
Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
Increases BRV by 50% of HP damage dealt to target
All targets: 4 turns 風聖 Resist Down
Cancels 2 levels of active Battle Spirit Unleashed
BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ while Battle Spirit Unleashed active

passives.name: Speed Buff
passives.desc: Moderately raises SPD with active buffs

passives.name: Aura Cannon Extension
passives.desc:
When using Aura Cannon:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
 • All targets: 4 turns 風聖 Resist Down
 • 4 turns ATK Up II becomes 8 turns 1 level of Battle Spirit Unleashed (limit 4; slightly increased MAX BRV、 moderately increased ATK; does not increase based on Battle Spirit Unleashed level)

Aura Cannon becomes Aura Cannon+ (BRV attack that ignores DEF; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%; increases BRV by 50% of HP damage dealt to target; does not grant Battle Spirit Unleashed; cancels 2 levels of active Battle Spirit Unleashed) with at least 3 levels of Battle Spirit Unleashed

BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (magic BRV attack; BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage; deals extra BRV damage to ghost types; increases active Battle Spirit Unleashed level by 1) while Battle Spirit Unleashed active
passives.short_desc: Aura Cannon Extension: Boost to Aura Cannon

passives.name: Buffed Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRV、 ATK with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buffed Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Razor Gale Extension
passives.desc:
When using Razor Gale:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; largely increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Target: 4 turns 風聖 Resist Down
 • 8 turns slight boost to MAX BRV Up
 • Self: 8 turns 1 level of Battle Spirit Unleashed (limit 4)
 • Triggers additional group HP attack after use; deals proportionate HP damage to each target

Razor Gale becomes Razor Gale+ (BRV attack that ignores DEF; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 200%; delays all targets 1 turn;  does not grant Battle Spirit Unleashed; cancels 2 levels of active Battle Spirit Unleashed) with at least 3 levels of Battle Spirit Unleashed
passives.short_desc: Razor Gale Extension: Boost to Razor Gale

passives.name: Destruction Brilliance
passives.desc: • Slightly raises MAX BRV、 ATK
passives.short_desc: Destruction Brilliance: Slightly raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Set Battle Spirit Unleashed Extension
passives.desc: When using Set Battle Spirit Unleashed:\n • Adds effect that slightly raises own ATK for 2 turns
passives.short_desc: Set Battle Spirit Unleashed Extension: Boost to Set Battle Spirit Unleashed
